mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (email, name, password) VALUE (#{email},#{name},#{password});
mapper.select: select m.email, m.name, m.password, m.fromSocial, m.regDate, m.modDate, mr.roleSet from tbl_member m left outer join tbl_member_role_set mr on m.email = mr.email where m.email = #{username} and m.fromSocial = #{fromSocial} group by m.email
